title: Know what i hate most about lee sin?
body: Not his insane mobility, not the damage, not the utility. Its the fact that he is immune to nerfs despite a nearly 40% playrate while maintaining a 50% winrate, and whenever he is nerfed? He'll be back, dont worry #LC$BIGPLAY$ gotta come from somewhere
